title: Kelly Clarkson Announces 2025 Las Vegas Residency: How To Get Tickets
description: Clarkson's new Las Vegas residency, "Studio Sessions" begins in July 2025. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here. Kelly Clarkson Announces 2025 Las Vegas Residency: How To Get Tickets Paolo Ragusa
author: Paolo Ragusa
excerpt: Kelly Clarkson has announced the 2025 "Studio Sessions" residency at The Colosseum at Caesar's Palace. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here.
text: Kelly Clarkson has announced a new residency at The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace in Las Vegas. Billed as Clarkson’s “Studio Sessions,” the residency formally kicks off on July 4th, 2025. Find more details below, including how to get tickets, as well as the full list of Clarkson’s residency dates. Get Kelly Clarkson Tickets Here There are multiple pre-sales running for Clarkson’s 2025 Las Vegas residency. Citi customers will have access to a pre-sale beginning on Friday, February 7th at 10:00 a.m. PST. An artist pre-sale is running via Clarkson’s fan club starting Saturday, February 8th at 10:00 a.m. PST (fans can sign up on Clarkson’s official website). Lastly, a Live Nation pre-sale will begin starting Monday, February 10th at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code DUET). Tickets will go on-sale for the general public on Friday, February 14th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on sale, fans can also look for deals or get tickets to sold-out dates via StubHub, where your purchase is 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s Fan Protect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. For more information on What Is Kelly Clarkson’s 2025 Las Vegas Residency? Kelly Clarkson’s “Studio Sessions” Residency at the Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace in Las Vegas is an 18-date run taking place from July to November 2025. It’s Clarkson’s second Las Vegas residency following 2023-2024’s “Chemistry: An Intimate Evening with Kelly Clarkson” at Planet Hollywood. The run kicks off with an opening show on July 4th; she’ll continue with shows on July 5th, 11th-12th, 18th-19th, 25th-26th, August 1st-2nd, 8th-9th, and 15th-16th. After a three month break, Clarkson will conclude the run with four shows on November 7th, 8th, 15th, and 16th. See Clarkson’s full list of tour dates below. “I’m so excited to be back in Vegas!” said Clarkson in a statement. “We’re bringing the studio to the stage this time with ‘Studio Sessions!’ See y’all there!” What Is the Setlist for Kelly Clarkson’s 2025 Residency? The exact list of songs on her setlist is unknown, but Clarkson peppered dozens of fan-favorites on her last Vegas outing, like “Sunce U Been Gone,” “Behind These Hazel Eyes,” “Stronger (What Doesn’t Kill You),” and more. Given the run’s studio-centric theme, expect a stripped-down presentation and perhaps a few Kellyoke covers throughout the residency. What Are Kelly Clarkson’s 2025 Tour Dates? See Kelly Clarkson’s full list of 2025 tour dates below, and get tickets here. 07/04 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/05 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/11 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/12 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/18 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/19 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/25 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 07/26 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 08/01 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 08/02 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 08/08 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 08/09 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 08/15 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 08/16 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 11/07 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 11/08 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 11/14 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace 11/15 — Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace
html:
Kelly Clarkson has announced a new residency at The Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace in Las Vegas. Billed as Clarkson’s “Studio Sessions,” the residency formally kicks off on July 4th, 2025.

Find more details below, including how to get tickets, as well as the full list of Clarkson’s residency dates.

Get Kelly Clarkson Tickets Here

There are multiple pre-sales running for Clarkson’s 2025 Las Vegas residency. Citi customers will have access to a pre-sale beginning on Friday, February 7th at 10:00 a.m. PST. An artist pre-sale is running via Clarkson’s fan club starting Saturday, February 8th at 10:00 a.m. PST (fans can sign up on Clarkson’s official website).

Lastly, a Live Nation pre-sale will begin starting Monday, February 10th at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code DUET). Tickets will go on-sale for the general public on Friday, February 14th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Once tickets are on sale, fans can also look for deals or get tickets to sold-out dates via StubHub, where your purchase is 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s Fan Protect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

For more information on

What Is Kelly Clarkson’s 2025 Las Vegas Residency?

Kelly Clarkson’s “Studio Sessions” Residency at the Colosseum at Caesar’s Palace in Las Vegas is an 18-date run taking place from July to November 2025. It’s Clarkson’s second Las Vegas residency following 2023-2024’s “Chemistry: An Intimate Evening with Kelly Clarkson” at Planet Hollywood.

The run kicks off with an opening show on July 4th; she’ll continue with shows on July 5th, 11th-12th, 18th-19th, 25th-26th, August 1st-2nd, 8th-9th, and 15th-16th. After a three month break, Clarkson will conclude the run with four shows on November 7th, 8th, 15th, and 16th. See Clarkson’s full list of tour dates below.

“I’m so excited to be back in Vegas!” said Clarkson in a statement. “We’re bringing the studio to the stage this time with ‘Studio Sessions!’ See y’all there!”

What Is the Setlist for Kelly Clarkson’s 2025 Residency?

The exact list of songs on her setlist is unknown, but Clarkson peppered dozens of fan-favorites on her last Vegas outing, like “Sunce U Been Gone,” “Behind These Hazel Eyes,” “Stronger (What Doesn’t Kill You),” and more. Given the run’s studio-centric theme, expect a stripped-down presentation and perhaps a few Kellyoke covers throughout the residency.

What Are Kelly Clarkson’s 2025 Tour Dates?

See Kelly Clarkson’s full list of 2025 tour dates below, and get tickets here.
